page.title: 08MORE STREET GAMES - CALNE
page.content: Round my street we play lots of games the two games we play most are football and Bulldog.Bulldog is a game played by any amount of players. First of all we play a game called "Spuds". Everyone who is playing puts one hand into the middle then you count around the hands from one to ten whoever ten lands on they are "on" it.The rest line up against the wall then the person who is "on" it shouts out a name and that person has to run past the catcher without being tagged. Then everyone else tries to run past the catcher. If he is caught he joins the catcher to tag the rest. They then call out the next name and so it goes on till everyone is caught.If the catcher shouts "Bulldog" everybody has to run.When everyone is out you have to start again.
